title: Build Your First AI Agent (Tool-Using & Reasoning Agent in Python)
subtitle: Build Your First AI Agent From Scratch

instructor.name: Harpreet Singh
instructor.bio: Harpreet Singh is a Full Self-Driving (FSD) & Robotics Engineer with 5+ years of expertise in AI-driven autonomy, specializing in motion planning, computer vision, and simulation, who has mentored 10,000+ students globally while founding two award-winning Robotics/AI startups recognized by Startup India and Punjab Government, combining deep technical knowledge in AI decision-making and sensor fusion with a passion for advancing intelligent systems through engineering, education and entrepreneurship.

whatYouWillLearn: How to build your first AI Agent using raw Python - no frameworks!
Core principles of agent architecture: memory, reasoning, and tool-use
Fundamentals of retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) and semantic search
A behind-the-scenes look at modern LLM-based agent systems like AutoGPT, LangChain, and CrewAI

about.description: This free live webinar gives you real, hands-on experience with cutting-edge AI agent development. You won't just hear about agents - you'll build one from scratch using simple code and powerful logic.
buildLive: A basic tool-using agent that fetches weather or math results
A memory-powered system that can recall and reason over past inputs
A simple semantic search function using vector similarity
A command-line chatbot with early steps of autonomy

whoIsThisFor.title: College Students
whoIsThisFor.description: Start building real AI systems, not just theory. Perfect for engineering, computer science, or AI/ML students.

whoIsThisFor.title: Developers
whoIsThisFor.description: Learn how agents, tools, and LLMs work together. Ideal for software engineers looking to build AI-powered applications.

whoIsThisFor.title: Career Changers & Founders
whoIsThisFor.description: Break into the red-hot field of autonomous AI systems. Prototype and launch your own AI agents.
